titles.en: Chapter 34 – Rewards of the one who enshrouds a Believer
Chapter 34 – Rewards of the one who enshrouds a Believer

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ سَيْفِ بْنِ عَمِيرَةَ عَنْ سَعْدِ بْنِ طَرِيفٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ كَفَّنَ مُؤْمِناً كَانَ كَمَنْ ضَمِنَ كِسْوَتَهُ إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Sayf Bin Ameyra, from Sa’ad Bin Tareyf, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who enshrouds a Believer would be like the one guarantees his dress up to the Day of Judgement’.
